code: import React from'react';import siteContent from'../data/siteContent';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=_ref=>{let{activeSection,setActiveSection,scrollToSection}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 bg-black bg-opacity-80 z-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4 py-4 flex flex-wrap justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-10 h-10 bg-yellow-500 rounded-full overflow-hidden",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:siteContent.navigation.logo.path,alt:siteContent.navigation.logo.alt,className:"w-full h-full object-cover"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"ml-3 text-xl font-bold",children:siteContent.meta.title})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex space-x-6",children:siteContent.navigation.links.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`px-3 py-2 ${activeSection===item.id?'text-yellow-500':'text-white'}`,onClick:()=>scrollToSection(item.id),children:item.label},item.id))})]})});};export default Navigation;
